applet_name: Backup your iPhone contacts to single Google Document

applet_name: Sync all your new iOS Contacts to a Google Spreadsheet
applet_description: Automatically save new iOS Contacts you add to a Google spreadsheet for easy sorting and searching.

applet_name: Send me a list of my new contacts over the week, so I remember to stay in contact.
applet_description: Send me a list of my new contacts over the week, so I remember to stay in contact.

applet_name: Whenever you add a new iOS contact mark it in your Google Calendar
applet_description: Keep track of when you met new contacts. For every new iOS contact, an event will be made in Google Calendar on the day the contact was added.

applet_name: Save new iOS Contacts to your Google Contacts
applet_description: This Applet will save any new iOS contact to your Google Contacts.

applet_description: never be bothered by accidental deletion or miss placement of contacts again.

applet_description: Wanna find the new friends in your contacts u just met last night but just can't recall the name?

applet_description: Get an email for each new entry you add to iOS Contacts. This could be helpful, it also may not.

applet_description: Send new contact information to OneNote

applet_name: Create a note for every new contact you add on your iPhone

applet_name: Save all your contacts
applet_description: You can use this for save your stuff

applet_name: Automatically add new iOS Contacts to your Google services
applet_description: The Applet allows you to sync new iOS contacts with your most used Google services. New contacts will be added to a Google spreadsheet, added to your Google contacts, and marked in your Google calendar.

applet_name: Automatically back up new iOS Contacts to Dropbox
applet_description: Never lose a phone number or email address again. Sync all your new contacts to Dropbox automatically!

applet_name: Send an email to your Gmail with the details when you add a new contact
applet_description: Turn your Gmail inbox into an easily searchable address book. When you add a new iOS contact, this Applet will send you an email with the name in the subject line, and all of the other details in the body. ðŸ™Œ

applet_name: New iOS Contact to Day One Entry
applet_description: Will add an entry to Day One each time a new contact is created.

applet_name: Sync new contacts to Airtable
applet_description: Automatically save new iOS Contacts you add to Airtable. Perfect for CRM use cases where you want to sort, filter, and store additional information about your contacts.

applet_name: Box cloud contacts backup
applet_description: Backups your contacts into separate text files in your box cloud
